items.sentence: I knew that you wouldn't want to go to Australia with Tom.
I told Tom that I didn't want to go to Australia with him.
I suspected Tom had never actually ever visited Australia.
Many people around the world go to bed hungry every night.
I didn't think that Tom would be so determined to do that.
Tom didn't want people to think he was flirting with Mary.
I can smell Mary's perfume. She must've been here earlier.
You knew that sooner or later it would happen, didn't you?
We have to be there an hour in advance to get our tickets.
Tom isn't the only person in our office who speaks French.
I've often heard of these, but I've never seen one before.
Tom locked himself in his room and closed all the windows.
It was clear from the beginning it was a terrorist attack.
I got up early this morning, so I'm more tired than usual.
Are you telling me that you don't know how to use a phone?
Tom was watching Mary very carefully to see what she'd do.
This is one of the poems that I had to memorize in school.
The fire must've broken out after the staff had gone home.
Is there some reason that you're saving these old bottles?
What's the most important lesson that life has taught you?
